question:
####UFAQ [Michael Boggs]
If the Runner removes a program hosted on [Dhegdheer](/en/card/13020) from the game as the cost for using Rosetta 2.0, by how much is the install cost of the new program lowered?
answer: Dhegdheerâ€™s cost reduction only applies at the time the program hosted on it is installed. The install cost of the new program will be lowered by the printed cost of the trashed program.
